mapper.select: select permission.* from role join account_role on (account_role.role_id = role.id and role.is_del = 0) join account on (account.id = account_role.account_id and account.is_del = 0) join role_permission on (role.id = role_permission.role_id) join permission on (permission.id = role_permission.permission_id and permission.is_del = 0) where account.username = #{username} group by permission.id

select permission.* from role join role_permission on role.is_del = 0 and role.id = role_permission.role_id join permission on permission.id=role_permission.permission_id and permission.is_del=0 where role.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update permission set is_del=1 where id=#{permission.id}
